title: I want my new photos to save onto my phone's storage, not cloud. How can I change the setting?
content: My Pixel 1 saved photos to my phone's storage. When full, I would empty my storage into an external hard drive before backing up to cloud. I upgraded to a Pixel 3a and now all my photos go straight to the cloud. I prefer the way it was with my first Pixel. How do I change the storage settings on my Pixel 3a so new photos save to my phone first?
